models.name: soil_layers
models.description: Soil profile showing topsoil (organic-rich), subsoil, and bedrock layers with plant roots

models.name: crop_growth_stages
models.description: Maize/rice growth stages: seed, germination, seedling, vegetative, flowering, grain formation, harvest

models.name: livestock_anatomy
models.description: Livestock digestive systems: cow (ruminant with rumen), goat (smaller ruminant), chicken (crop and gizzard)

models.name: farm_tools_3d
models.description: Traditional Nigerian farm tools: hoe (weeding), cutlass (clearing), plough (tilling), harrow (breaking soil)

models.name: irrigation_systems
models.description: Three irrigation methods: drip (efficient, targeted), sprinkler (overhead spray), surface (furrow channels)

models.name: greenhouse
models.description: Modern greenhouse with transparent walls/roof, metal frame, potted plants, ventilation, and irrigation
